title: Smudge Me Not Liquid Lipstick
Description: If you've ever lusted for a one-coat wonder product for your lips, your search ends here. Get a full-blooded burst of pigment with just a single swipe of the SUGAR Smudge Me Not Liquid Lipstick that will stay the day and right up till the night! Wine, coffee, and date-proof - this is a matte lipstick that is guaranteed to last longer than your longest day. Available in 52 stunning shades that will make it difficult to choose - the question is, are you ready to commit to a lipstick that is built to last?
Ingredients: Isododecane, Dimethicone & Isododecane & Trimethylsiloxysilicate, Cyclopentasiloxane & Trimethylsiloxysilicate, Disteardimonium Hectorite, Propyl Paraben, Propylene Carbonate, Vitamin - E, Fragrance, Approved colours.

title: Ace of Face Foundation Stick
Description: Designed to look and feel like skin, this award-winning foundation is formulated with a unique transparent base and is expertly calibrated to your undertone to even out and correct the complexion in one simple step. Featuring a blend of emollients like olive extract and shea butter, the formula moisturizes wherever skin is dry. Delivers medium to full coverage and is water-, sweat- and humidity-resistant. Available in 43 shades.
Ingredients: Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Ethylhexyl Palmitate, Cetyl Dimethicone, Polymethylsilsesquioxane, Beeswax\\Cera Alba\\Cire D'Abeille, Ozokerite, Euphorbia Cerifera (Candelilla) Wax\\Candelilla Cera\\Cire De Candelilla, Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea Butter), Talc, Octyldodecanol, Caprylic/Capric/Myristic/Stearic Triglyceride, Silica, Propylene Glycol Laurate, Tocopherol, Squalane, Pentaerythrityl Tetra-Di-T-Butyl Hydroxyhydrocinnamate, [+/- Mica, Iron Oxides (Ci 77491), Iron Oxides (Ci 77492), Iron Oxides (Ci 77499), Titanium Dioxide (Ci 77891)]

title: Kohl Of Honour Intense Of Kajol
Description: Eye makeup can be tricky but a stroke of genius can put you at ease. Add to that colour and soft creamy texture and you know you've been hooked for life. We're on about Sugar Stroke of Genius Heavy-Duty Kohl - a waterproof kohl pencil that can add pretty to your eyes in a single swipe. Its wax-based formula spreads evenly and lasts for up to 8 hours. Not just that, it comes with a free sharpener to ensure your eye makeup is always on point.
Ingredients: Iron Oxides, Black 2, Mica, Ferric Ferrocyanide, Dimethicone, Synthetic Wax, Silica, Stearyl Dimethicone, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Trimethylsiloxysilicate/Dimethiconol Crosspolymer, Octadecene, Dimethicone/Vinyl Dimethicone Crosspolymer, Pentaerythrityl Tetra-Di-T-Butyl Hydroxyhydrocinnamate, Isoceteth-10.

title: Nykaa's Go-to Minis
Countour De Force Face Palette
Description: Achieve jaw-dropping, #nofilter beauty looks that'll set your Insta-circle on fire with the all-new SUGAR Contour De Force Face Palette. Crafted for the makeup maven who's slaying goals on the go, this sleek all-in-one face palette houses a power-packed trio of bronzer, highlighter and blush - exactly what you'd love to stash in your clutch to create any look in a flash. Just mix, layer and blend these uber-creamy, lightweight powders for a great payoff that lasts all day, any day. See the magic unfold in the built-in mirror that's super handy for on-the-spot application and prepare to be stunned with how easily this face palette takes your makeup game to a whole new level!
Ingredients: Icelandic Moss Extract (60%), Purified Water, Propanediol, Butylene Glycol, 1,2-Hexanediol, Niacinamide, Glycerin, Glyceryl Less -26, Ethyl Ascorbyl Ether (100 ppb), Tangerine Peel Extract, Jailri Till Glucoside, Xylitol, Glucose, Anhydroxylitol, Centella Asiatica Extract, Purslane Extract, Mart Rica Ria Flower Extract, Che East Tree Extract, Burdock Root Extract, Mud Mushroom Extract, Ceramide & P, Allantoin, Squalane, Orange Peel Oil, Olive Oil, Palmarosa Oil, Philippines Orange Peel Oil, Klee Rio Day, Evening Primrose Oil, Safflower Seed Oil, Cellulose Gum, Ethylhexyl Palmitate, Acrylates / C10-30 Alkyl Acrylate Crosspolymer, Cetyl Ethylhexanoate

title: Drop The Base Serus Foundation
Description: Been wanting a lightweight foundation that doesn't weigh your skin down and freshens your complexion? It's time to grab SUGAR Drop The Base Serum Foundation right away! This product is magic for so many reasons - With a feather-weight fluid and velvety texture that lends a flawless medium to high coverage, this foundation is a skin-perfecting luxury itself. It delivers a natural finish and the look and feel of beautiful skin. The result is a noticeably brighter and youthful appearance. Ladies, grab this magic potion and revel in the luxury now.
Ingredients: Dimethicone, Cyclohexasiloxane, Isododecane, Vinyl Dimethicone, EthylHexyl Methoxycinnamate, Phenyl Trimethicone, Alaria Esculentia, Disteardimonium Hectorite, Isohexadecane, Peg-10 Dimethicone, Zinc Oxide, Polybutene, Talc, Propylene Carbonate, Cyclopentasiloxane, Parfum, Hydrogen Dimethicone, CI 77891, CI 77491, CI 77492, CI 77499

title: Colorbar Matte Me As I Am Lipcolor
Description: Intense moisture meets rich matte with Colorbar's Matte Me As I Am Lipcolor. A single stroke is all you need for luscious creaminess in a light-weight texture. A multi-tasking, extra long wearing extra pigmented formula that provides smooth coverage that can easily take any lip look. This cult-favorite, matte lip pencil will instantly deliver the impact of a pure lipstick with the spontaneity of a pencil and the feel of a tattoo. Time to get loud with your lipstick and make a sexy runway statement!
Ingredients: Talc, Mica, Dimethicone, Isostearyl Neopentanoate, Zinc Stearate, Polybutene, Octyldodecyl Stearoyl Stearate, Caprylyl Glycol, Phenoxyethanol, Hexylene Glycol, Isopropyl Isostearate, Nylon-12, Aqua, Benzyl Alcohol, Dehydroacetic Acid, Sodium Hyaluronate, Ubiquinone, Tocopheryl Acetate, Retinyl Palmitate, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Ascorbyl Palmitate, Citric Acid, Glyceryl Oleate, Glyceryl Stearate, Lecithin, Tocopherol, Tin Oxide, Titanium Dioxide, CI 77891, CI 77491, CI 77492, CI 77499, CI 15850

Description: Not just an exfoliator, PHAs are also humectants and moisturizers. Gluconolactone (PHA used in this formula) provides up to 50% protection against UV radiation. It is a soothing peeling solution formulated with turmeric extract and aloe juice to calm skin irritation commonly associated with peeling.

title: Cheat Sheet Clarifying Face Mask
Description: Give your skincare regime a boost with Nykaa Clay It Cool! Clay Masks. This multitasking mask, comes in 7 variants with ingredients that target specific skin concerns. So treat your skin to the ultimate TLC with our clay masks and say hello to supple, rejuvenated skin!
Ingredients: Milk, Honey, Fruits and Kojic Acid

title: Watermelon Glow Sleeping Mask
Description: Watermelon Glow Sleeping Mask is a skin-lightening product. This is a unique tan removing formula that lightens skin tone, removing tanning effect of the sun. This product is unique, in that, it doesn't have any kind of colour lifting effect on facial hair like the normally used skin bleach.
Ingredients: Kakadu Plum: It fights oxidative stress by neutralizing skin damaging free radicals. It repairs the damage caused by sun and pollution, thus recharging skin and reversing signs of aging while also enhancing skin radiance.

title: Pore Cleansing Overning Cream
Description: Balance out your oily skin and help your acne to heal with Sebamed's Clear Face Cleansing Foam. Great as a daily cleanser, it is ultra-hydrating without draining your skin of moisture. The refreshing foam gently removes oil while the special formula fights pimple-causing bacteria without making your face red or shiny.
Ingredients: Water, Cocamidopropylalbetainamide MEA Chloride, Cocotrimonium Mthosulfate, Sodium Lactate, Panthenol (Vitamin B5), Fragrance (Parfum), Phenoxyethanol.

title: Countour De Force Face Cream
Description: Countour De Force Face Cream specially designed for sun tanned skin. It is enriched with scientifically extracted natural actives like milk, honey, tomato, lemon, bilberry 7 grape fruit extracts and essential oils. The kojic acid present in the products helps to inhibit the melanin formation and lightens the skin tone on regular usage. Pure milk and honey help moisturizes and hydrates your skin. Raaga Professional de-tan cream is a skin-lightening product. This is a unique tan removing formula that lightens skin tone, removing tanning effect of the sun. This product is unique, in that, it doesn't have any kind of colour lifting effect on facial hair like the normally used skin bleach.
Ingredients: Milk, Honey, Fruits and Kojic Acid

title: Nykaa Naturals Tea Tree & Neem Purifying Face Wash for Acne
Description: Nykaa Naturals Face Wash is a gentle cleanser that refines your skin. With every wash it rids your skin of impurities and residual make-up, while dissolving dead cells. Take your pick from 3 different variants that address common skin concerns and go beyond surface cleansing.
Ingredients: Aqua, Capryloyl/Caproyl Methyl Glucamide (and) Lauroyl/Myristoyl Methyl Glucamide, Cocamidopropyl Betaine, Glycerine, Maltooligosyl Glucoside (and) Hydrogenated Starch Hydrolysate, Sodium Cocoyl Apple Amino Acids, Polysorbate 60, Caprylhydroxamic Acid (and), Caprylyl Glycol (and) Glycerin, Carbomer, Coffee Extract, Sodium Palmitoyl Proline (and) Nymphaea Alba Flower (White Water Lily) Extract, Betaine, Fragrance, Aloe Barbadensis (Aloe Vera), Citrullus Lanatus (Water Melon), Caffeine, Sodium Gluconate, Seaweed Extract, Triethanolamine

Description: Give your face the daily boost of clear freshness with mCaffeine Naked & Raw Coffee Face Wash ' a deep cleansing formula, enriched with Pure Arabica Coffee and exotic White Waterlily. With the first signs of stress and impurities, your face starts looking dull, tired and uneven. mCaffeine Coffee Face Wash removes the excess oil and dirt and gets rid of dullness from the face. A naturally-foaming formula that is SLS and Paraben free. Made for both Men & Women, the skin purifying ingredients clarify the skin, fight acne and pimples, and prevent them from coming back.

title: Olay Total Effects 7 In One Touch Of Foundation BB Cream Day SPF 15
Description: Trust the Olay Total Effects 7 In One BB Cream for your everyday look. This multi-tasking moisturizer has a touch of foundation to give you a brighter and healthy looking even skin instantly. It combines 7 anti ageing benefits, SPF 15, plus a touch of sheer foundation for a natural look that evens out skin tone and smoothes out the appearance of wrinkles. It contains VitaNiacin Complex, with Vitamins B3, C, and E that enhances skin surface's natural self-renewal process. The SolaSheerTM technology with broad spectrum UVA/UVB protection SPF15 gently protects the surface of your skin from daily incidental UV exposure.
Ingredients: Active ingredients: 4% octisalate, 2% avobenzone, 1% octocrylene, 1% ensulizole. Also contains: water, glycerin, niacinamide,* dimethicone, titanium dioxide, isopropyl palmitate, aluminum starch octenylsuccinate, behenyl alcohol, sodium ascorbyl phosphate,† panthenol,§ tocopheryl acetate,** amellia sinensis leaf extract, zinc oxide, stearyl alcohol, sorbitan stearate, polyacrylamide, polyethylene, triethanolamine, cetyl alcohol, benzyl alcohol, dimethiconol, peg-100 stearate, c13-14 isoparaffin, laureth-7, cetearyl glucoside, cetearyl alcohol, ammonium polyacrylate, stearic acid

Treat your skin with this powerful multi-tasker that corrects, hydrates, repairs and protects your skin from sun damage, leaving it feeling healthy and fresh. Nykaa SKINgenius BB cream gives you the benefit of skincare in makeup. Enriched with extracts of Aloe Vera, Green Tea, Cucumber and Jojoba, this cream gives a boost of anti-oxidants to your skin, making it naturally healthy and radiant.

Deep moisturization and nourishment for dull, dry skin, the two products; one in-shower and another one post-shower can get the desired sheen on your skin. Bid goodbye to tired skin, uneven skin tone & dryness. Loaded with Pure Arabica Coffee and Chocolate the mCaffeine Body Polishing Kit is here for giving you the ultimate bath experience.

title: Lakme Sun Expert SPF 50 PA+++ Ultra Matte Lotion Sunscreen

title: The Body Shop Vitamin C Glow Boosting Moisturiser
Description: Say goodbye to grumpy, dull, fatigued looking skin and reveal your natural, healthy-looking glow with our Vitamin C Glow Boosting Moisturiser. This gel cream moisturiser helps: Boost glow: Skin is clarified, revealing your natural healthy-looking glow Energize: Fresh, lightweight formula fights signs of fatigue, with an invigorating fragrance Hydrate: Infuses skin with juicy moisture Infused with our Amazonian Camu Camu Berries, which have up to 60X the Vitamin C power of and orange.

title: Max Care Virgin Coconut Oil (Cold Pressed)
Description: Maxcare Virgin Coconut Oil (VCO) is pure, unrefined, cold pressed oil extracted from fresh coconut milk. The cold process method ensures that all the vital nutrients and the natural goodness of fresh coconuts are retained. Rich in several essential fatty acids and antioxidants, virgin coconut oil is a versatile oil for both health and beauty. Unlike commercial coconut oil are made by expeller method from dehydrated coconut meat, Max Care VCO has a delicate mild fresh aroma and taste.
Ingredients: 100% pure and cold-pressed virgin coconut oil

title: Nykaa Wanderlust Shower Gel - Sicilian Sweet Pea

title: Bio Oil Skin Care Oil - Scars, Stretch Mark, Ageing, Uneven Skin Tone, 200ml (Pack of 2)
Description: Bio−Oil should be massaged in a circular motion on the face or body until fully absorbed. It is recommended that Bio−Oil be used twice daily for a period of 3 months.
Ingredients: Isododecane, Dimethicone & Isododecane & Trimethylsiloxysilicate, Cyclopentasiloxane & Trimethylsiloxysilicate, Disteardimonium Hectorite, Propyl Paraben, Propylene Carbonate, Vitamin - E, Fragrance, Approved colours.

title: Pilgrim Ultra Hydrating Shea and Cocoa Body Butter with White Lotus
Description: Our ultra-hydrating Shea and Cocoa body butter is enriched with vitamins and antioxidant rich white lotus extracts.
Ingredients: Cyclopentasiloxane & Trimethylsiloxysilicate, Disteardimonium Hectorite, Propyl Paraben, Propylene Carbonate, Vitamin - E, Fragrance, Approved colours.

title: The Body Care Blueberry Bathsalt
Description: The Body Care Blueberry Bathsalt is a detoxifying delicately scented bath provides warm intense rich aroma which turns an ordinary bath into relaxing and fragrant retreat. it eliminates body aches and joint pains. it will uplift your mood and freshen up your senses.
Ingredients: Mineral Sea Salt, Fumed Silica, Colour & Perfume.

title: Maybelline New York Instant Age Rewind Eraser Multi-Use Concealer - Ivory
Description: Eye makeup can be tricky but a stroke of genius can put you at ease. Add to that colour and soft creamy texture and you know you've been hooked for life. We're on about Sugar Stroke of Genius Heavy-Duty Kohl - a waterproof kohl pencil that can add pretty to your eyes in a single swipe. Its wax-based formula spreads evenly and lasts for up to 8 hours. Not just that, it comes with a free sharpener to ensure your eye makeup is always on point.
Ingredients: Iron Oxides, Black 2, Mica, Ferric Ferrocyanide, Dimethicone, Synthetic Wax, Silica, Stearyl Dimethicone, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Trimethylsiloxysilicate/Dimethiconol Crosspolymer, Octadecene, Dimethicone/Vinyl Dimethicone Crosspolymer, Pentaerythrityl Tetra-Di-T-Butyl Hydroxyhydrocinnamate, Isoceteth-10.

title: Kohl Of Honour Intense Of Kajol
Description: Eye makeup can be tricky but a stroke of genius can put you at ease. Add to that colour and soft creamy texture and you know you've been hooked for life. We're on about Sugar Stroke of Genius Heavy-Duty Kohl - a waterproof kohl pencil that can add pretty to your eyes in a single swipe. Its wax-based formula spreads evenly and lasts for up to 8 hours. Not just that, it comes with a free sharpener to ensure your eye makeup is always on point.

title: Revolution Pro Eye Elements - Magnetic
Description: Create a blank canvas that makes eyeshadows pop. Creamy and richly pigmented, Revolution Pro Eye Elements glides on and dries down to a long-wearing matte finish that makes the perfect base for your eye look.
Ingredients: Isododecane, Octyldodecanol, Polyethylene, Hydrogenated Microcrystalline Cera, Cyclopentasiloxane, Aluminum Starch Octenylsuccinate, Trimethylsiloxysilicate, Triethoxycaprylylsilane.

title: Too Faced Shadow Insurance Eye Shadow Primer
Description: Too Faced Shadow Insurance Eye Shadow Primer is a featherweight eye primer that locks down shadows for 24 hours of crease-proof, budge-proof, waterproof wear and true color payoff. Shadow Insurance locks down eyeshadows, intensifying color to ensure waterproof, crease and fade-proof coverage for up to 24 hours. The ultra-lightweight, colorless formula glides effortlessly onto lids, leaving a smooth, even canvas for budge-proof shadow application.
Ingredients: Isododecane, Talc, Cyclopentasiloxane, Disteardimonium Hectorite, Trimethylsiloxysilicate, Glyceryl Triethylhexanoate, Polyethylene, Trihydroxystearin, Sorbitan Sesquioleate, Isopropyl Lanolate, VP/Eicosene Copolymer, Propylene.

title: Huda Beauty Eazy Lash - Hoodie
Description: After Years Of Expertise In Handcrafting And Designing Hundreds Of False Lashes, The Queen Of Lashes Has Finally Created Her Own Signature Lash! Hoodie #23 Is Ultra-Dramatic, Ultra-Fluffy, Ultra-Long And Ultra-Voluminous For The Ultimate Lash Lover.
Ingredients: Synthetic Fibres.

title: Olay Ultimate Eye Cream (Dark Circles Wrinkles & Puffiness)
Description: Eye makeup can be tricky but a stroke of genius can put you at ease. Add to that colour and soft creamy texture and you know you've been hooked for life. We're on about Sugar Stroke of Genius Heavy-Duty Kohl - a waterproof kohl pencil that can add pretty to your eyes in a single swipe. Its wax-based formula spreads evenly and lasts for up to 8 hours. Not just that, it comes with a free sharpener to ensure your eye makeup is always on point.
Ingredients: Iron Oxides, Black 2, Mica, Ferric Ferrocyanide, Dimethicone, Synthetic Wax, Silica, Stearyl Dimethicone, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Trimethylsiloxysilicate/Dimethiconol Crosspolymer, Octadecene, Dimethicone/Vinyl Dimethicone Crosspolymer, Pentaerythrityl Tetra-Di-T-Butyl Hydroxyhydrocinnamate, Isoceteth-10.

title: Re'equil Under Eye Cream
Description: The area around the eye, also referred to as periorbital area is prone to hyperpigmentation due to various internal or external stressors. Since the causative factors for periorbital hyperpigmentation around the eye are often different from pigmentation on the face or other body parts, it needs specific products for treatment.
Ingredients: Chenopodium Quinoa Seed Extract is an excellent source of antioxidants, vitamins (C & E), and other essential fatty acids. All of them work together to protect the skin from free radical damage which in turn keeps the under eye skin hydrated, firm, and soft.

title: Mixify Unloc Under Eye Scrub
Description: Get all the nurturing benefits of exfoliation with the new Unloc Mixify Under Eye Scrub that tenderly scrubs away dirt and dead cells from around your eyes to reveal its vigour. With the powerful properties of hibiscus, rose and ginseng extract with rice exfoliator, this scrub is a wonderful product for your eyes.
Ingredients: Rice powder is a moisturizing agent and a mild exfoliator. It nourishes the under eye skin in multiple ways by removing dead cells and impurities.

title: PIXI DetoxifEYE Patches
Description: Instantly reduce under-eye puffiness and dark circles while moisturizing and soothing your skin with Pixi's DetoxifEYE hydrogel eye patches. These depuffing under eye patches help refresh and hydrate the undereye area as well as reduce the appearance of undereye circles. These patches can be refrigerated before use to help cool and de-puff the skin.
Ingredients: Aqua/Water/Eau, Glycerin, Carrageenan, Cocos Nucifera (Coconut) Fruit Extract, Pinus Sylvestris Leaf Extract, Caffeine, Gold (CI 77480), Cucumis Sativus (Cucumber) Fruit Extract, Rubus Idaeus (Raspberry) Fruit Extract, Rubus Coreanus Fruit Extract, Vaccinium Angustifolium (Blueberry) Fruit Extract, Ribes Nigrum (Black Currant) Leaf Extract.

title: Makeup Revolution Creative Vol
Description: Show your true colours with this beautifully bold palette. Revolution Creative Vol 1 features 24 matte and shimmer pigmented shades, from warm bronze and neutral tones, to pops of canary yellow, fuchsia pink and turquoise hues. Get creative with this kaleidoscopic palette inspired by the feathers of a Peacock. Shake your tail feather!
Ingredients: Iron Oxides, Black 2, Mica, Ferric Ferrocyanide, Dimethicone, Synthetic Wax, Silica, Stearyl Dimethicone, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Trimethylsiloxysilicate/Dimethiconol Crosspolymer, Octadecene, Dimethicone/Vinyl Dimethicone Crosspolymer, Pentaerythrityl Tetra-Di-T-Butyl Hydroxyhydrocinnamate, Isoceteth-10.

title: Colorbar Bewitching Eyeshadow Palette - Midsummer Breeze
Description: Soft and smoky or sultry and statement? Unleash your inner eye stylist with Colorbar Bewitching Eyeshadow Palettes featuring high intensity shades perfect for a day to glam look. Each palette is curated with four harmonious highly pigmented, long-lasting eye colors. A step-by-step application that makes artistry easy, create a smooth base for your eye look using the Prime shade; build up definition with Intensify.
Ingredients: Talc USP, Calcium Sodium Borosilicate, Mica, Zinc Stearate, Lauroyl Lysine, Tocopherol, Lecithin, Ascorbyl Palmitate, Glyceryl Stearate, Glyceryl Oleate, Citric Acid, Caprylyl Glycol, Hexylene Glycol, Phenoxyethanol, Titanium Dioxide.

title: Lime Crime Wet Cherry Lip Gloss - Cherry Candy
Description: Get the dripping wet reflection of a maraschino cherry in a gloss. Its next-level shine feels lightweight and comfortable on your lips. Sparkly sheer finish is packed with iridescent pearls that light up lips. Translucent pigments let your lips natural beauty shine through. Cute chubby tube with over-sized doe-foot applicator lets you load on shine!
Ingredients: Mineral Oil (Paraffinum Liquidum), Polybutene, Polybutylene Terephthalate, Ethylene/Propylene/Styrene Copolymer, Calcium Sodium Borosilicate, Acrylates Copolymer, Butylene/Ethylene/Styrene Copolymer, Ethylene/VA Copolymer, Hydrogenated Polyisobutene, Tin Oxide, BHT, Flavor (Aroma), Benzyl Benzoate, Limonene, Eugenol, Cinnamal, Palmitic Acid, Benzoic Acid, Caprylyl Glycol, Ethylhexylglycerin, Hexylene Glycol

title: DIOR Addict Lip Maximizer Gloss - 004 Coral
Description: Dior Lip Maximizer, now a must-have for makeup artists, is the 1st Dior backstage lip plumping gloss for smooth, hydrated lips and an instant, long-lasting plump effect!
Ingredients: Polybutene, Diisostearyl Malate, Paraffinum Liquidum (Mineral Oil), Tridecyl Trimellitate, Pentaerythrityl Tetraisostearate, Ethylhexyl Palmitate, Silica Dimethyl Silylate, Dipalmitoyl Hydroxyproline, Menthoxypropanediol, Polyglyceryl-2 Triisostearate, Parfum (Fragrance), Synthetic Fluorphlogopite, Palmitic Acid, Trihydroxystearin, Butylene Glycol, Trimethylolpropane Triisostearate, Phenoxyethanol, Caprylyl Glycol, Sodium Hyaluronate, Capsicum Frutescens Fruit Extract, Atelocollagen, Tocopherol, Hexylene Glycol, Benzyl Alcohol

title: Kay Beauty Matte Action Lip Pencil - Hypnotic
Description: Kay Beauty Matte Action Lip Line & Fill Pencil is designed to contour and enhance your lips while ensuring your lip crayon does double the time. With long lasting staying power, this statement worthy revolutionary lip pencil has ultra rich matte finish so your lips look like a dream!
Ingredients: Talc, Mica, Dimethicone, Isostearyl Neopentanoate, Zinc Stearate, Polybutene, Octyldodecyl Stearoyl Stearate, Caprylyl Glycol, Phenoxyethanol, Hexylene Glycol, Isopropyl Isostearate, Nylon-12, Aqua, Benzyl Alcohol, Dehydroacetic Acid, Sodium Hyaluronate, Ubiquinone, Tocopheryl Acetate, Retinyl Palmitate, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Ascorbyl Palmitate, Citric Acid, Glyceryl Oleate, Glyceryl Stearate, Lecithin, Tocopherol, Tin Oxide, Titanium Dioxide, CI 77891, CI 77491, CI 77492, CI 77499, CI 15850

title: Huda Beauty Power Bullet and Lip Contour Pencil Lip
Description: Inspired By Huda’S Latest Obsessions With The Retro Vibes Of The ’90S, Take Your Lip Game To The Next Level With These Amazing Matte Acrylic, Lip-Shaped Kits. They’Re The Perfect Gift For Lipstick Lovers!
Ingredients: Isododecane, Mica, Synthetic Wax, Hydrogenated Polydicyclopentadiene, Polybutene, Nylon-12, Polyglyceryl-4 Diisostearate/Polyhydroxystearate/Sebacate, Ethylhexyl Palmitate,Copernicia Cerifera (Carnauba)

title: e.l.f. Cosmetics Lip Primer & Plumper - Natural / Clear
Description: Achieve longer lasting lip color and sexy plumped lips with e.l.f Lip Primer & Plumper. The primer creates a base for lip color for no budge, no smudge pigment that lasts all day. The cinnamon scented formula enhances your lips with a subtle plumping tingle effect for fuller, larger looking lips!
Ingredients: Ethylhexyl Palmitate, Talc, Paraffin, Polyisobutene, Mica, Microcrystalline Wax (Cera Microcristallina), Bis-Diglyceryl Polyacyladipate-2, Euphorbia Cerifera (Candelilla) Wax,Triacontanyl PVP, Montana Cera, Phenoxyethanol

title: Bobbi Brown Extra Lip Tint - Bare Nude
Description: Lightweight, sheer and ultra-moisturizing, this formula has all the benefits of your go-to balm plus a color-enhancing tint that brings out the best in lips!
Ingredients: Hydrogenated Polyisobutene , Phytosteryl/Isostearyl/Cetyl/Stearyl/Behenyl Dimer Dilinoleate , Polyglyceryl-10 Diisostearate , Microcrystalline Wax\Cera Microcristallina\Cire Microcristalline , Phytosteryl/Octyldodecyl Lauroyl Glutamate , Synthetic Wax , Cetearyl Alcohol , Octyldodecanol , Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride

title: Revlon Kiss Cushion Lip Tint - Pretty Kiss
Description: Plush tip for a lush lip! With its soft cushion tip, Revlon's Kiss Cushion Lip Tint delivers a stain of color and tons of moisture. The pillowy soft cushion tip helps to evenly distribute the tint and makes it easy to build for more impact. This one of a kind product features a unique formula that's infused with coconut oil to keep your lips soft and supple. The result? You get the look of a lip stain, beautifully blotted and weightless color with the lushness of a balm!
Ingredients: Isohexadecane, Trimethylsiloxyphenyl Dimethicone, Mica, Phenyl Trimethicone, Dimethicone, Trimethylsiloxysilicate, Disteardimonium Hectorite, Cetyl PEG/PPG-10/1 Dimethicone, Hexyl Laurate, Polyglyceryl-4 Isostearate, Polyethylene, BHT, Cocos Nucifera (Coconut) Oil, Crambe Abyssinica Seed Oil, Diisostearyl Malate, Sclerocarya Birrea Seed Oil

title: LANEIGE Lip Sleeping Mask Berry
Description: Experience smooth firming lip night care with the new lip sleeping pack, available in berry, grapefruit, apple lime scents!
Ingredients: Diisostearyl Malate, Hydrogenated Polyisobutene, Phytosteryl/Isostearyl/Cetyl/Stearyl/Behenyl Dimer Dilinoleate, Hydrogenated C6-14 Olefin Polymers, Polybutene, Microcrystalline Wax, Shea Butter, Synthetic Wax, Candelilla Wax, Sucrose Tetrastearate Triacetate, Hydrogenated Butylene/Ethylene/Styrene Copolymer, Ethylene/Propylene/Styrene Copolymer, Mica, Astrocaryum murumuru Seed Butter, Titanium Dioxide, Dimethicone,

title: LANEIGE Holiday Mini Lip Sleeping Mask Set
Description: Laneige is offering Lip Sleeping Masks in small sizes with a special lemon, berry and grape fragrance only during the holiday season, making it a good gift set!

title: Bare Body Essentials Lip Scrub
Description: Prepare your lips for pout perfection using Bare Body Essentials Lip Scrub. It doesn't just smoothen your lips by removing dead skin cells from your lips but also heals and moisturizes them with the goodness of cocoa butter, shea butter, almond oil, argan oil, beeswax, olive oil and vitamin E.!
Ingredients: Cocoa Butter, Shea Butter, Almond Oil, Argan Oil, Beeswax, Olive Oil, Vitamin E.

title: LANEIGE HYDRATION-TO-GO! For Combination to Oily Skin
Description: A five-piece, travel-friendly set of TSA approved hydration essentials for a non-oily, balanced complexion wherever life takes you. An on-the-go kit powered by nutrient-rich fruits and vegetable extracts. The products in this kit are free of sulfates SLS and SLES, parabens, phthalates, and mineral oil.
Ingredients: Water / Aqua / Eau, Glycerin, Myristic Acid, Stearic Acid, Peg-32, Potassium Hydroxide, Palmitic Acid, Lauric Acid, Cocamidopropyl Betaine, Glyceryl Stearate, Peg-100 Stearate, Microcrystalline Cellulose, Fragrance / Parfum, Sodium Chloride, Disodium Edta, Linalool, Limonene, Sodium Benzoate, Polycaprolactone

title: Uncle Tony on the Go Hygiene Kit
Description: Uncle Tony On-The-Go Hygiene Kit welcomes the new normal with 4 face masks, gloves, hand sanitizer, wet wipes and shoe cover. Uncle Tony aims to make your travel safe and sound. The 3 ply face masks, lemon fragrance wet wipes and shoe cover make this on-the-go kit more special and worthy of your trust! Go out and enjoy the life 'safely' with Uncle Tony's all new hygiene kit.
Ingredients: Isopropyl Alcohol 70% Purified Water, Glycerin, Aloe Vera Extract, Neem Extract, Sandalwood Fragrance

title: Kama Ayurveda Essential Skincare Regime Gift Set
Description: No one likes dull or tired skin! Kama Ayurveda brings to you all your skincare essentials that cleanse, tone and hydrate your skin.
Ingredients: Vetiver, Aloe Vera, Black Cumin Seeds, Jojoba

title: Kama Ayurveda Pure Indulgence
Description: Indulge yourself in the purity of authentic, time tested Ayurvedic treatments for your face and body with Kama Ayurveda. Luxuriate in the enticing scenes of Kannauj roses, shea lotus, and lime. A special curation of bath and body essentials, this makes for an ideal gift this festive season.
Ingredients: Coffee, Sorbitol, Glucose, Cocos Nucifera Oil (Coconut Oil), Sodium Lauroyl Glutamate, Potassium Sorbate, Sodium Benzoate

title: Beardo Celeb Gift Box
Description: The Beardo Combo gift box, comprising of Beardo Charcoal Facewash, Beardo Strong Hold Hair Wax and Beardo Godfather Oil is a perfect gift for the man who wants to look and feel like a million bucks! Give him the gift of a clean, well-manicured beard, with the Beardo Celeb Gift Box and he'll be ever so grateful!
Ingredients: Kakadu Plum: It fights oxidative stress by neutralizing skin damaging free radicals. It repairs the damage caused by sun and pollution, thus recharging skin and reversing signs of aging while also enhancing skin radiance.
